title: Psychological Emotive Tactics Emergency Response Protocol v1.0
description: A comprehensive report with itemized, per-person analysis for impact, patterns, risks, and recommendations.

initialRole.description: Apparent role (e.g., Aggressor, Targeted Individual, Bystander).

incidentAnalysis.description: A high-level summary of the overall incident, including per-person analysis.

executiveSummary.description: A 1-2 sentence overview of the conflict and its outcome.

managementRiskAssessments.description: An itemized list of forward-looking risks for the organization.

managementRecommendations.description: Recommendations for the HR or Management team.

participantAnalyses.description: Individual analysis for each person involved in the incident.

impactAssessment.description: Assessment of the overall emotional and professional impact on this specific individual.

patternAnalysis.description: Analysis of this person's recurring tactics or behavioral patterns.

individualRiskAssessments.description: An itemized list of risks associated with this individual's behavior (e.g., flight risk, performance decline).

messageAnalysis.description: A chronological, message-by-message breakdown of the conversation.

messageID.description: The sequential order of the message (1, 2, 3...).

identifiedTactics.description: Tactics identified in this specific message.

justification.description: Reasoning for why this message matches the tactic's definition.

likelyGoal.description: The likely strategic goal of the actor.

intendedImpact.description: The likely intended impact on the target.
